products.title: Antiviral Cotton Roller Blind
products.description: Cool, creamy and bright, this clean and simple off-white roller blind will diffuse the light coming into your space for a light, but private, glow. The clue to its real strength is in its name though, an innovative antiviral additive that helps to prevent viruses - along wit cool, creamy and bright, this clean and simple off-white roller blind will diffuse the light coming into your space for a light, but private, glow.

products.title: Taylor Cotton Vertical Blind
products.description: Subtle vertical bands add life and texture to this clean, stark white fabric. Simple, slick and contemporary, the brightness of the fabric oozes purity and style. Install in any space thanks to the robust material and functional design of this uncomplicated but stylish verti subtle vertical bands add life and texture to this clean, stark white fabric.

products.title: Empathy Blackout Cotton White Roller Blind
products.description: Just so perfectly simple. This roller blind is pristine white with a structured weave that creates a minimalist look. Wonderful for adding texture, freshness and signature style to your space. A perfect choice for any sophisticated room and thanks to the blackout finish just so perfectly simple.

products.title: Bright White & Cotton - 50mm Slat
products.description: Here the bright white wooden slat and cotton tape come together for the freshest, whitest look possible. If its pure white that you want then this is the blind for you. Working well in rooms that need a simple look at the window this blind will coordinate with so many decors here the bright white wooden slat and cotton tape come together for the freshest, whitest look possible.
